    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>

          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Circuit diagram</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schaltplan</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Schéma de circuit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Diagrama de circuito</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Schema circuitale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διάγραμμα κυκλωμάτων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esquema circular</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This circuit diagram shows a light bulb connected to a battery of cells and two open switches.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">battery</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Cells</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">circuit diagram</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light bulb</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">open switch</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieser Schaltplan zeigt eine Glühlampe, die an 
eine Batterie der Zellen und zwei geöffneter Schalter angeschlossen 
wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce schéma de circuit montre une ampoule reliée 
à une batterie des cellules et de deux commutateurs ouverts.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama de circuito mostra um bulbo claro 
conectado a uma bateria das pilhas e de dois interruptores abertos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema circuitale mostra una lampadina 
collegata ad una batteria delle cellule e di due interruttori aperti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα κυκλωμάτων εμφανίζει ελαφρύ βολβό 
που συνδέεται με μια μπαταρία κυττάρων και δύο ανοικτών 
διακοπτών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este esquema circular muestra una bombilla 
conectada con una batería de células y de dos interruptores 
abiertos.</string>
          </description>
